item.title: The Politicization of Everything Didn’t Start with Trump’s Kennedy Center Visit
item.description: Why is the New York Times , of all places, surprised?

item.title: Washington State’s Attack on the Confessional Is a Threat to All of Us
item.description: Religious groups must be free to practice their faith without fear of government intrusion.

item.title: What Fathers Could Learn from Papa Bear
item.description: The patriarch of the Berenstain Bears’ family is not a wimp. He is an unconventional, if unkempt, knight.

item.title: In Obama They Trusted — Too Much
item.description: The ‘Lightworker’ president’s most important legacy ought to be to make us skeptical of political movements based on cults of personality.

item.title: A Beautiful Mind: Brian Wilson, R.I.P.
item.description: What the driving creative force behind the Beach Boys gave to the world, and to me.
